name: AI-based PRD Reviewer
description: AI tool for PRD analysis, grading, and actionable feedback.

planned.model_content:
class Prd < ApplicationRecord
  belongs_to :user
  has_many :reviews, dependent: :destroy

  rhino_owner_base
  rhino_references [:user]
end
planned.migration_content:
class CreatePrds < ActiveRecord::Migration[7.2]
  def change
    create_table :prds do |t|
      t.string :title
      t.text :content
      t.datetime :upload_timestamp
      t.references :user, null: false, foreign_key: true

      t.timestamps
    end
  end
end
planned.rails_model_generation_command_line: rails generate model Prd title:string content:text upload_timestamp:datetime user:references

planned.model_content:
class Review < ApplicationRecord
  belongs_to :prd
  has_many :feedbacks, dependent: :destroy

  rhino_owner :prd
  rhino_references [:prd]
end
planned.migration_content:
class CreateReviews < ActiveRecord::Migration[7.2]
  def change
    create_table :reviews do |t|
      t.string :overall_grade
      t.text :analysis_summary
      t.datetime :review_timestamp
      t.references :prd, null: false, foreign_key: true

      t.timestamps
    end
  end
end
planned.rails_model_generation_command_line: rails generate model Review overall_grade:string analysis_summary:text review_timestamp:datetime prd:references

planned.model_content:
class Feedback < ApplicationRecord
  belongs_to :review

  rhino_owner :review
  rhino_references [:review]
end
planned.migration_content:
class CreateFeedbacks < ActiveRecord::Migration[7.2]
  def change
    create_table :feedbacks do |t|
      t.string :category
      t.text :specific_feedback
      t.text :suggested_improvement
      t.references :review, null: false, foreign_key: true

      t.timestamps
    end
  end
end
planned.rails_model_generation_command_line: rails generate model Feedback category:string specific_feedback:text suggested_improvement:text review:references
